CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 19, 1958, pg. A1 reads: "Talking Politics? - What else would one expect this quintet of regular Democratic organization stalwarts to talk about when they meet? They managed to get into this "session" during the reception tendered the Hon. Andrew M. Bradley, Secretary of Property and Supplies of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, by some Allegheny County Democrats in the beautiful Terrace Hall Hotel, Sunday evening.  Enjoying the session are, left to right: Atty. James F. Clarke, candidate for the Legislature, First District; Fifth Ward Alderman Harry B. Fitzgerald, Atty. K. Leroy Irvis, candidate for the Legislature, First District, also; Mr. Bradley and Fifth Ward Chairman Robert E. (Pappy) Williams, magistrate. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Atty. James F. Clarke, Alderman Harry B. Fitzgerald, Atty. K. Leroy Irvis, Andrew M. Bradley, and Robert E. "Pappy" Williams, standing in Terrace Hall Hotel
